__e: - Christy, you can not go well.
If Christy hadn't caught me banging her best friend, I'd still be doing it.
Christy, that's not the reason you stopped coming, is it?
I realized Jeanine was getting kind of serious, so I did the decent thing. I packed up Christy, and we snuck out in the middle of the night.
Sent me on the bus to my Aunt Christy, gave her money to take care of me.
I want to start by saying... I never liked Christy, and I never thought she was good enough for you.
